channel.title: Catching Run-Time Errors, Help Me

item.title: Catching Run-Time Errors, Help Me
item.dc:creator: @Call_of_Duty Call of Duty
item.description:
@Call_of_Duty wrote:

Well, I’m trying to get this right, but I’m getting stuck on when I’m trying to catch the run-time error, if one occurs

public URL getCodeBase() { try { return new URL((new StringBuilder()).append("http://").append(server).append(":80").toString()); //return new URL("http://po4.runescape.com:" + (80 + anInt870)); } catch (Exception e) { log((new StringBuilder()).append("An exception occured in getCodeBase(): ").append(e).toString()); return super.getCodeBase(); } }

This is for my JMenuBar, but I can’t get this right, can someone please help me out?

My error is this:

Gui.java:722: 'catch' without 'try' catch (Exception e) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue...

Read full topic
